attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition for the Re opening of the children's assessment unit,children's a&e,planned overnight inpatient care and emergency overnight inpatient care in the riverbank ward Bedford.
The riverbank ward should not be closed down its totally unreasonable to be traveling to a alternative hostipal when we have this fantastic facility on our doorstop that's with out the extra costs to families that who are already at their financial limits. The riverbank ward has helped so many families and are a big part of so many families life's they are a fantastic team and the goverment should fund or do whatever they can to keep the ward open.
SAVE RIVERBANK WARD
